mapper.select: SELECT count(estatus) AS estatus FROM cuadrilla WHERE id_cuadrilla = #{idCuadrilla} AND estatus = 'I'

SELECT c.id_cuadrilla, c.nombre_cuadrilla, c.calificacion, c.estatus,ca.descripcion AS nombre_vialidad, count(e.id_empleado) AS numero_personas FROM cuadrilla c LEFT JOIN empleado e ON e.id_cuadrilla = c.id_cuadrilla AND e.estatus = 'A' LEFT JOIN catalogo ca ON c.codigo_vialidad = ca.codigo WHERE c.estatus = 'A' GROUP BY c.id_cuadrilla, c.nombre_cuadrilla
